trans-unit.source: Exposes the public members of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> class to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 向非托管代码公开 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> 类的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此接口是用于访问到托管类，从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType> class discovers the attributes of a class constructor and provides access to constructor metadata.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>类发现类构造函数的属性，并提供对构造函数元数据的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface preserves the vtable order of the <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType> class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口保留的 vtable 顺序<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>类可以访问由非托管 COM 对象的成员。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Attributes" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Attributes" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Attributes%2A> property gets the attributes associated with this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Attributes%2A>属性获取与此方法关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.CallingConvention" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.CallingConvention" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CallingConventions" /> for this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CallingConventions" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.CallingConvention%2A> property gets a value indicating the calling conventions for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.CallingConvention%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示此方法的调用约定。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 声明该成员的类的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType%2A> property gets the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType%2A>属性获取声明此成员的类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.Equals(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Object.Equals(System.Object)" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see langword="true" /> 等于当前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.Object" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法确定是否指定<xref:System.Object>等同于当前<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes" /> members.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes" /> 成员的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> members return all attributes applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>成员返回应用于此成员的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜索此成员的继承链以查找属性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Boolean)" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains all the custom attributes, or an array with zero elements if no attributes are defined.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含所有自定义属性的数组，在未定义任何特性时为包含零个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method returns an array containing all the custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法返回包含所有自定义特性的数组。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: Only attributes that are assignable to this type are returned.
trans-unit.target: 仅返回可分配给此类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜索此成员的继承链以查找属性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetCustomAttributes(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetCustomAttributes(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An array of custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero (0) elements if no attributes have been applied.
trans-unit.target: 应用于此成员的自定义属性的数组；如果未应用任何特性，则为包含零 (0) 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method returns an array of custom attributes identified by <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法返回包含由标识的自定义特性的数组<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> method serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>方法用作特定类型的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> 适用于哈希算法和哈希表之类的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 留待将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的名称的传入数组。

trans-unit.source: Count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的名称的计数。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解释名称的区域设置上下文。

trans-unit.source: Caller-allocated array that receives the IDs corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 调用方分配的数组，用于接收与名称对应的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 将一组名称映射为对应的一组调度标识符。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodImplementationFlags" /> member.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodImplementationFlags" /> 成员的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes" /> flags.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes" /> 标志。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A> member returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes> flags.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A>成员返回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes>标志。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetParameters" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetParameters" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> containing information that matches the signature of the method (or constructor) reflected by this instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> 类型的数组，包含与此实例所反射的方法（或构造函数）的签名相匹配的信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetParameters%2A> method gets the parameters of the specified method or constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetParameters%2A>方法中获取指定的方法或构造函数的参数。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.GetType" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Object.GetType" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method gets the type of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>方法获取当前实例的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 类型信息的区域设置标识符。

trans-unit.source: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 接收一个指针，指向请求的类型信息对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 检索对象的类型信息，然后可以使用该信息获取接口的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个位置，该位置接收对象提供的类型信息接口的数量。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 检索对象提供的类型信息接口的数量（0 或 1）。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the member.
trans-unit.target: 标识成员。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 留待将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解释参数的区域设置上下文。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述调用的上下文的标志。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个结构的指针，该结构包含一个自变量数组、一个命名自变量的 DISPID 自变量数组和数组中元素数的计数。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向要存储结果的位置的指针。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个包含异常信息的结构的指针。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一个出错自变量的索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供对某一对象公开的属性和方法的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::Invoke`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: The instance that created this method.
trans-unit.target: 创建了此方法的实例。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="BindingFlags" /> values that specifies the type of binding.
trans-unit.target: 指定绑定类型的 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Binder" /> that defines a set of properties and enables the binding, coercion of argument types, and invocation of members using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Binder" />，它定义一组属性并通过反射来启用绑定、自变量类型强制转换和成员调用。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, then <see langword="Binder.DefaultBinding" /> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>binder</c> 为 <see langword="null" />，则使用 <see langword="Binder.DefaultBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="Object" /> used to match the number, order, and type of the parameters for this constructor, under the constraints of <c>binder</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Object" /> 类型的数组，该类型用于在 binder<c></c> 的约束下匹配此构造函数的参数的个数、顺序和类型。

trans-unit.source: If this constructor does not require parameters, pass an array with zero elements, as in Object[] parameters = new Object[0].
trans-unit.target: 如果此构造函数不需要参数，则像 Object[] parameters = new Object[0] 中那样传递一个包含零元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: Any object in this array that is not explicitly initialized with a value will contain the default value for that object type.
trans-unit.target: 此数组中未使用值显式初始化的任何对象都将包含该对象类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: For reference-type elements, this value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于引用类型元素，此值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For value-type elements, this value is 0, 0.0, or <see langword="false" />, depending on the specific element type.
trans-unit.target: 对于值类型元素，此值为 0、0.0 或 <see langword="false" />，具体取决于特定的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制类型强制转换的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 <see langword="null" />，则使用当前线程的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke(System.Object,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke(System.Object,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 与构造函数关联的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke%2A> method invokes the constructor reflected by this <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> with the specified arguments, under the constraints of the specified <xref:System.Reflection.Binder>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke%2A>方法调用由此反射的构造函数<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>带指定参数，指定的约束下<xref:System.Reflection.Binder>。

trans-unit.source: The instance that created this method.
trans-unit.target: 创建了此方法的实例。

trans-unit.source: An argument list for the invoked method or constructor.
trans-unit.target: 调用方法或构造函数的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: This is an array of objects with the same number, order, and type as the parameters of the method or constructor to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 此对象数组在数量、顺序和类型方面与要调用的方法或构造函数的参数相同。

trans-unit.source: If there are no parameters, <c>parameters</c> should be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在任何参数，则参数<c></c>应为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the method or constructor represented by this instance takes a <see langword="ref" /> parameter (<see langword="ByRef" /> in Visual Basic), no special attribute is required for that parameter in order to invoke the method or constructor using this function.
trans-unit.target: 如果由此实例表示的方法或构造函数采用了 <see langword="ref" /> 参数（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="ByRef" />），那么此参数不需要特殊属性来通过此函数调用此方法或构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Any object in this array that is not explicitly initialized with a value will contain the default value for that object type.
trans-unit.target: 此数组中未使用值显式初始化的任何对象都将包含该对象类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: For reference-type elements, this value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于引用类型元素，此值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For value-type elements, this value is 0, 0.0, or <see langword="false" />, depending on the specific element type.
trans-unit.target: 对于值类型元素，此值为 0、0.0 或 <see langword="false" />，具体取决于特定的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke(System.Object,System.Object[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke(System.Object,System.Object[])" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 与构造函数关联的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke%2A> method invokes the method or constructor represented by this object, using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke%2A>方法调用的方法或此对象，使用指定的参数所表示的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="BindingFlags" /> values that specifies the type of binding.
trans-unit.target: 指定绑定类型的 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Binder" /> that defines a set of properties and enables the binding, coercion of argument types, and invocation of members using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Binder" />，它定义一组属性并通过反射来启用绑定、自变量类型强制转换和成员调用。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, then <see langword="Binder.DefaultBinding" /> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>binder</c> 为 <see langword="null" />，则使用 <see langword="Binder.DefaultBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="Object" /> used to match the number, order, and type of the parameters for this constructor, under the constraints of <c>binder</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Object" /> 类型的数组，该类型用于在 binder<c></c> 的约束下匹配此构造函数的参数的个数、顺序和类型。

trans-unit.source: If this constructor does not require parameters, pass an array with zero elements, as in Object[] parameters = new Object[0].
trans-unit.target: 如果此构造函数不需要参数，则像 Object[] parameters = new Object[0] 中那样传递一个包含零元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: Any object in this array that is not explicitly initialized with a value will contain the default value for that object type.
trans-unit.target: 此数组中未使用值显式初始化的任何对象都将包含该对象类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: For reference-type elements, this value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于引用类型元素，此值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For value-type elements, this value is 0, 0.0, or <see langword="false" />, depending on the specific element type.
trans-unit.target: 对于值类型元素，此值为 0、0.0 或 <see langword="false" />，具体取决于特定的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制类型强制转换的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 <see langword="null" />，则使用当前线程的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 与构造函数关联的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke%2A> method invokes the constructor reflected by this <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> object with the specified arguments, under the constraints of the specified <xref:System.Reflection.Binder> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke%2A>方法调用由此反射的构造函数<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>对象使用指定的参数，指定的约束下<xref:System.Reflection.Binder>对象。

trans-unit.source: An array of values that matches the number, order, and type (under the constraints of the default binder) of the parameters for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 与此构造函数的参数的个数、顺序和类型（受默认联编程序的约束）相匹配的值的数组。

trans-unit.source: If this constructor takes no parameters, then use either an array with zero elements or <see langword="null" />, as in Object[] parameters = new Object[0].
trans-unit.target: 如果此构造函数不采用参数，则使用具有零个元素或 <see langword="null" /> 的数组，如 Object[] parameters = new Object[0] 中所示。

trans-unit.source: Any object in this array that is not explicitly initialized with a value will contain the default value for that object type.
trans-unit.target: 此数组中未使用值显式初始化的任何对象都将包含该对象类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: For reference-type elements, this value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于引用类型元素，此值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For value-type elements, this value is 0, 0.0, or <see langword="false" />, depending on the specific element type.
trans-unit.target: 对于值类型元素，此值为 0、0.0 或 <see langword="false" />，具体取决于特定的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System.Object[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System.Object[])" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 与构造函数关联的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke%2A> method invokes the constructor reflected by the instance that has the specified parameters, providing default values for the parameters not commonly used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke%2A>方法时，将调用具有指定的参数，为不常用的参数提供默认值的实例反射的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsAbstract" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsAbstract" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method is abstract; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该方法是抽象的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsAbstract%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the method is abstract.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsAbstract%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示方法是否为抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsAssembly" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsAssembly" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method can be called by other classes in the same assembly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法可以由同一程序集中的其他类调用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsAssembly%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this method can be called by other classes in the same assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsAssembly%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示是否可以由同一程序集中的其他类中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsConstructor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsConstructor" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method is a constructor; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法为构造函数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsConstructor%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the method is a constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsConstructor%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示方法是否一个构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object to which the custom attributes are applied.
trans-unit.target: 将应用自定义属性的 <see langword="Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜索此成员的继承链以查找属性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> member.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 成员的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more instances of <paramref name="attributeType" /> is applied to this member; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此成员应用了一个或多个 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A> member indicates whether one or more instances of `attributeType` is applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A>成员指示是否的一个或多个实例`attributeType`应用于此成员。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamily" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamily" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the class is restricted to members of the class itself and to members of its derived classes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对此类的访问只限于此类本身的成员和它的派生类的成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamily%2A> property gets a value indicating whether access to this method is restricted to members of the class and members of its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamily%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示是否对此方法的访问仅限于类的成员和其派生的类的成员。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamilyAndAssembly" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamilyAndAssembly" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to this method is restricted to members of the class itself and to members of derived classes that are in the same assembly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对此方法的访问只限于此类本身的成员和同一程序集中的派生类的成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamilyAndAssembly%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this method can be called by derived classes if they are in the same assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamilyAndAssembly%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示是否它们在同一程序集，是否可以由派生类中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamilyOrAssembly" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamilyOrAssembly" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to this method is restricted to members of the class itself, members of derived classes wherever they are, and members of other classes in the same assembly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对此方法的访问只限于该类本身的成员、派生类的成员（与它们的位置无关）以及同一程序集中其他类的成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamilyOrAssembly%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this method can be called by derived classes, wherever they are, and by all classes in the same assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFamilyOrAssembly%2A>属性获取一个值，该值它们的位置无关，并且由同一程序集中的所有类，是否可以由派生类中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFinal" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFinal" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method is <see langword="final" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法为 <see langword="final" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFinal%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this method is `final`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsFinal%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示此方法是否`final`。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the member is hidden by signature; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此成员被签名隐藏，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig%2A> property gets a value indicating whether only a member of the same kind with exactly the same signature is hidden in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsHideBySig%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示是否在派生类中隐藏只有完全相同的签名的相同种类的成员。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsPrivate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsPrivate" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to this method is restricted to other members of the class itself; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对此方法的访问只限于该类本身的其他成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsPrivate%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this member is private.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsPrivate%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示此成员私有。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsPublic" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsPublic" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method is public; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法是公共的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsPublic%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this is a public method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsPublic%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示这是否为公共方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSpecialName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSpecialName" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method has a special name; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法具有特殊名称，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSpecialName%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this method has a special name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsSpecialName%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示此方法是否具有特殊的名称。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsStatic" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsStatic" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method is <see langword="static" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法为 <see langword="static" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsStatic%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the method is `static`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsStatic%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示方法是否`static`。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsVirtual" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsVirtual" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method is <see langword="virtual" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法为 <see langword="virtual" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsVirtual%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the method is `virtual`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.IsVirtual%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示方法是否`virtual`。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.MemberType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.MemberType" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> value indicating the type of member.
trans-unit.target: 指示成员类型的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.MemberType%2A> property gets a <xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes> value indicating the type of the member — method, constructor, event, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.MemberType%2A>属性可以获取<xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes>值，该值指示成员的类型-方法、 构造函数、 事件和等等。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.MethodHandle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodBase.MethodHandle" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.RuntimeMethodHandle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.RuntimeMethodHandle" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.MethodHandle%2A> property gets a handle to the internal metadata representation of a method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.MethodHandle%2A>属性获取方法的内部元数据表示的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of this member.
trans-unit.target: 包含此成员名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A> property gets the name of the current member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A>属性获取当前成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object through which this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> object was obtained.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，通过它获取了此 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType%2A> property gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType%2A>属性获取用于获取此实例的类对象<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。
